page.title: 14ASHILL CLUBS (2)
page.content: The{Scouts and Cubs}meet in the Cub Hut which stands on the village green. The school is the venue for the {Brownies, Guides}and the recently formed{Beavers}(boys aged 6 to 8). Monday nights at the community centre are devoted to{Judo,}two adult teachers providing children from 5 upwards the chance to keep fit, learn self defence and become adept at this martial art (Fee 40p). The{Youth Club}meets on Wednesday nights and provides a range of activities for teenagers, trips are arranged and continental holidays have also been undertaken (Fee 20p weekly plus Â£1.50 annual subscription). The Youth Club organise the yearly Carol Singing spanning 4 nights and raising between Â£120-Â£150 for local charities. A recently formed{Junior Youth Club (aged 8-12) meets twice monthly.
